### Bio

Hello! My name is Luca, and I am a 4th-year Political Science and Community Development major at the University of California, Davis. My research interests include housing and transportation accessibility and affordability, democratic backsliding, inequality, mass incarceration, media coverage of conflict, and other things of the sort.

Feel free to contact me at jalioto@ucdavis.edu
